ygData.subject: Re: Unrest is so unrestful!
ygData.msgSnippet: You know, speaking of Unrest for 13th level characters, I was in Unrest again last night, and there was a 13th level rogue killing death beetles in there.
ygData.messageBody:
You know, speaking of Unrest for 13th level characters, I was in
Unrest again last night, and there was a 13th level rogue killing
death beetles in there. After every beetle slain he would /cheer and
was really whooping it up. The high levels all got a big kick out of
it. He was getting high level buffs and heals while he was there.
Not a bad deal.


>From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Unrest is so unrestful!
>Date: Tue, 9 Nov 1999 15:38:30 -0500
>
>It's off of the zone Dagnor's Cauldron, which is off of Butcher Block in
>Faydwer. You CAN go there at level 13 with a group and kill yard trash
>for pretty good xp, but the trains there are really nasty. I didn't really
>do all that well in unrest until around level 24 when I got greater healing
>and dismiss undead. At that point, I was able to camp a room inside the
>house with relative ease. It's a great zone for loot as well as xp because
>most all of the monsters above the yard trash carry fine steel weapons, and
>a few have small bronze armor pieces. This zone is especially good for us
>clerics since about 90% of the monsters there are undead.
>
>Eachann Bronzeleaf,
>Cleric of Tunare, Tarrew Marr
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: <FalornEQ@...>
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 3:38 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Unrest is so unrestful!
>
>
> > From: FalornEQ@...
> >
> > Where in the hell is Unrest :-)
> >
> > Falorrn
> > Ignorant level 13 cleric
> >
> >
><< text3.html >>
